value.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Learn about using an Azure API gateway to share APIs with partners, and how to use subscription keys to control access to your APIs.

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the artificial intelligence algorithms in the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in images.

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
value.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

value.title: Explore Azure networking services
value.excerpt: Learn about the core networking resources that are available in Azure, such as Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, and ExpressRoute.

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
